00029 typedef struct _jamoma_timeevent{
00030         t_object                        *owner;                         // owning jamoma_time object
00031         t_object                        *client;
00032         method                          callback;
00033         double                          delaytime;
00034         double                          targettime;
00035         long                            repeating;
00036         long                            priority;
00037         void                            *transfer_mechanism;
00038         _jamoma_timeevent       *next;
00039         _jamoma_timeevent       *prev;
00040 } t_jamoma_timeevent;

00043 typedef struct _jamoma_time{
00044         t_pxobject                      obj;
00045         t_jamoma_timeevent      *event_head;
00046         t_jamoma_timeevent      *event_tail;

00048         double                          one_over_sr;
00049         unsigned long           samples_per_block;
00050         double                          current_time;           // in ticks
00051         unsigned long long      current_samples;        
00052         // TODO: some sort of accessor that would set tick period by saying 1000 ticks per second or something
00053 } t_jamoma_time;
